title: Ukrainian military had 64 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka of Luhansk region and Terny, Yampolivka, Ro...
content: Ukrainian military had 64 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka of Luhansk region and Terny, Yampolivka, Rozdolivka, Vesele of Donetsk region, Klischiyivka, Bohdanivka, Ivanivske of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Tonenke, Pervomayske of Donetsk region, Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka, Kostyantynivka and Urozhayne, Robotyne of Zaporizhzhia region, Krynky of Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
